attributes.action: get rid of the Primary Care Trust and GP referral system,and revert back to the old system of matrons running the hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since PCT's were introduced, the NHS has gone from bad to worse.  They have had a more than fair trial, and all that has happened it the NHS is deep in debt.  Get rid of these trusts, and that will generate a vast amount of money to be spent where it is meant to be, in the NHS. Similarly with the GP referral system. If a GP thinks a person needs hospital treatment, who are these bureaucrats who think differently?  A GP knows his patients better than some nameless panel.
